tool.name: Disruptin Proximity to Lysis Genes Tool
tool.description: identifies lysis gene candidates close to genes encoding endolysin domains and genes encoding transmembrane domains

data.name: oa
data.label: Protein with endolysin-associated domain and adjacent to lysis gene candidate

data.name: ob
data.label: Lysis gene candidates near possible endolysin

data.name: oc
data.label: Protein with transmembrane domain and adjacent to lysis gene candidate

data.name: od
data.label: Lysis gene candidates near TMD-containing protein

tool.help: **What it does** This program is intended to identify protein coding sequences within a certain window (number of base pairs) of genes encoding recognized endolysin domains and others encoding transmembrane domains. The goal is to identify possible lysis genes or to narrow a list of disruptin candidates.
